column3:
Nit: Either 
- "Set the transaction fee per kB (overwrites the paytxfee parameter)." or
- "Set the transaction fee per kB. (Overwrites the paytxfee parameter.)"

(http://english.stackexchange.com/questions/6632/where-does-the-period-go-when-using-parentheses)

Maybe?

``` diff
-            "
Set the transaction fee per kB.
"
+            "
Set the transaction fee per kB. Overwrites the paytxfee parameter.
"
```
